accountPending.title: We‘ve sent you an email
accountPending.text: With a magic link to the email address you provided. Please click the button on the email to verify your account.
accountPending.introBox: If you didn‘t receive an email please check your spam folder and if it isn‘t there contact us.

createAccount.title: Account details
createAccount.intro: These details are used to create your account

label.optIn: I would like to receive marketing emails and offers from GetGround
label.privacy: Creating an account means you accept our terms of service and Privacy Policy

note.password: Your password must be at least 6 characters long

form.correctErrors: Please correct all errors to proceed

slides.title: Get started
slides.copy:
In 5 Simple steps you will have created an account and profile.

It's then easy to set up and manage your Get Ground company.

slides.title: Save money
slides.copy:
Owning UK residential investment property in a company can save you money.

With Get Ground it has never been cheaper to own and run companies.

slides.title: Fast and efficient
slides.copy: Setting up and managing a company has never been easier. We use technology to take away the pain and hassle.

slides.title: All under one roof
slides.copy: Everything your company needs right here at getGround. Seamless access to other services, such as mortgage and insurance product. Get started now.

personalDetails.heading: Personal details
personalDetails.intro: These details are required to create your profile

form.dateOfBirthNote: You need to be 18 or over to use getGround

confirmation.heading: Well done
confirmation.copy:
Your details have been submitted. You will shortly receive an email with the result of your application.

This typically takes 10 mins but it can take up to a day, so please be patient.
confirmation.contactUsText: If this is taking longer than expected please contact us.

passport.title: Add passport picture
passport.content: In order to prove your identity we need you to take a picture of your passport, proof of address and then finally to take a selfie.
passport.link: If you already have it saved upload
